name: bloodorb
description:
This is a submission for juice jam ii.

Our group consists mostly of people who have never tried making a game. We had a hard time finishing up our ideation but ended up with a rough prototype.

Controls are: WASD to move, left click for ranged attack, and right click for close range attack. q for shield/parry.

Benjijump - programming, overall direction, VFX

ambiguousVv - art direction, art lead

Minwoo Han - Animation(skeletal), ideation

Yean Kim - concept art, ideation
